title: A CYP11A1 homozygous exonic variant inducing an alternative splicing, frameshift and truncation in a family with congenital adrenal hyperplasia
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Kheloud M. Alhamoudi, Meshael Alswailem, Balgees Alghamdi, Abdullah Alashwal, Ali S. Alzahrani
